name: Mortal Cells
description:
Mortal Cells is an arena based, third person shooter with a heavy enthesis on abilities and outplaying your opponent, whilst promoting a style of combat that requires the player to attack and defend at the same time.

Prototype that I built for my final year project at university.

Set in a tron -esque world as a futuristic spectated sport. 

Attempts to create a new and unique combat experience for the player.

The player carries a "power orb" on there back. Destroying the enemy's power orb will win you the game. Remember you have to protect your's at the same time!

PC - keyboard and mouse

1 v 1  Duel
2 playable maps
Multiplayer (LAN)
Third person shooter
Ability focused gameplay
Outplay your opponents.
Competitive.
